message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%.  We can adjust things in later rounds if you think it's not fair.
You got 90% last round, I'm offering you 20% this time. Be fair!

I understand you want more, but I'm not going to accept 20%. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 60% this time, and you take 40%.  It's a fair compromise, and we can avoid losing more money to inflation.
I'll meet you at 60%? I'll offer you 55% and take 45%. I'm trying to find a sweet spot.
